accountDetails.title: Profile
accountDetails.edit_message: The modified information will be displayed on the employee profile, but will not be reflected in his/her Movement History.
accountDetails.promote_message: The modified information is available in the Movements History located in the Salary section, so the employee can see all the movements made by the organization.
accountDetails.salary_increase_message: The modified information is available in the Movements History located in the Salary section, so the employee can see all the movements made by the organization.
